name: predictacare
description: PredictaCare is a comprehensive healthcare platform...

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run frontend" "npm run admin" "npm run node-backend" "npm run python-ml"
scripts.build:frontend: cd frontend && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:admin: cd admin && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:admin && npm run build:backend && npm run build:python
